headline: Thoma Bravo completes acqusition of Dayforce for $12.3B
summary: Thoma Bravo announced the completion of its acquisition of Dayforce (DAY) for approximately $12.3B. The agreement to acquire Dayforce was previously announced on August 21, and was approved by Dayforce stockholders at the special meeting of stockholders held on November 12. With the completion of the transaction, Dayforce stockholders are entitled to receive $70.00 per share in cash for each share of Dayforce common stock they owned. The Company’s common stock has ceased trading and will be deli
